data.name: Tales of Tomorrow: Experiment
data.detailed_description:
Check out also other games:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1682320/Barn_Finders_VR/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/991170/Barn_Finders/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1424060/BarnFinders_Amerykan_Dream/


About the Game



ToT: Experiment is a sci-fi short story game set on a remote ship wandering through space. Without any memories or recollection of his past our hero is tasked by the ship AI - EVE to perform daily tasks, that will help to maintain the ship. If he does, he is rewarded with break time, additional food or life improvements. If not - he is punished accordingly.

Will you discover the truth behind the ship and forces in control?

Where do you draw the line?


  • Mature storyline in form of short story game (2-3h gameplay)
  • High replayability (Map setup and key element placed randomized every time you start over)
  • Retro sci - fi theme with focus on psychological horror inspired by the movies Space Odyssey, Cube, The Moon or games like Slenderman
  • AAA graphic quality with ray tracing support

data.short_description: ToT: Experiment is a sci-fi short story game set on a remote ship wandering through space. Without any memories or recollection of his past our hero is tasked by the ship AI - AR.I.A. to perform daily tasks, that will help to maintain the ship.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 3550 / FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti / R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
